table.name: class
grade
schoolYear
classTeacher
table.sqlCommand: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `classTeacher` ( `ID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `forename` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `adress` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `telephone` varchar(64) NOT NULL, Primary Key (`ID`) );

table.name: administrator
users
table.sqlCommand: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` ( `ID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `forename` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `adress` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `telephone` varchar(64) NOT NULL, Primary Key (`ID`) );
